core.scenario_loader.ScenarioLoaderSimple¶

class core.scenario_loader.ScenarioLoaderSimple(case_study_conf=None, info_scenario=None, data_scenario=None, paras_scenario=None, log_file=None, print_color_info=None)¶

Bases: ScenarioLoader

This loader is used to load pickle files created by the download_tables.py script.
